gist.headline: Safe harbor for local models
gist.blurb: Welcome InferencePort AI to the hive! A new privacy-focused UI for running local models and managing chat sessions, now available in our Dev Tools.
gist.summary: Added InferencePort AI, a privacy-centric interface for local models and Spaces, to the community application directory.
gist.impact: Developers can now easily discover and access InferencePort AI for secure, local model experimentation.
gist.visual_concept: InferencePort -> A cozy pixel art harbor or dock. The bee is the harbor master. Represents a safe entry point for local AI models.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot acting as a harbor master at a tiny wooden dock labeled 'InferencePort'. She is guiding a small pixel boat carrying glowing data crates. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and peach pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic like Stardew Valley. Text in pixel font: 'SAFE HARBOR'. Cozy pixel art, 8-bit aesthetic, soft pastel gradients, warm lighting, retro gaming vibes.
